definition: topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]

sentences.english: There's an allusion there to memory, which will be a little apropos for Problem Set 2.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個對內存的暗示，對於習題集2來說是恰當的。

sentences.english: My daughter finished the exercises in lesson 96 this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上，我女兒完成了第九十六課的練習題。

sentences.english: Thus, ten days where day and night to draft and thoughts on all the Problem.
sentences.chinese: 因此，十天之裏日夜趕稿，思緒全在習題上。

sentences.english: "Most teachers give out practice exams and old exams anyway," she said.
sentences.chinese: “事實上，多數老師都會給出習題或舊試題”她說。

sentences.english: The space geometry experiences and observes exercise and the answer detailed explanation.
sentences.chinese: 空間幾何體練習題及答案詳解。

sentences.english: Hopefully you have a copy of the practice exam.
sentences.chinese: 但願你們都做了這份習題。

sentences.english: They were all concerning about the past tense and the present perfect.
sentences.chinese: 那些練習題都是跟一般過去時和現在完成時有關的。

sentences.english: The function of "task-based learning" in college courses;
sentences.chinese: 本文將大學物理習題課按教學要求進行分類。

sentences.english: You are welcome, and encouraged, to work on the assignment problems with fellow students.
sentences.chinese: 我們歡迎並且鼓勵你在做習題集的時候和同學討論。

sentences.english: The course assignments consist of both homeworks and problem sets.
sentences.chinese: 這門課的作業，同時由家庭作業與習題集兩者所組成。

sentences.english: So this is just a heads up for as you start your next problem set.
sentences.chinese: 所以這是給你們開始下個習題集的一點提示。

sentences.english: This course includes problem sets, found in the assignments section.
sentences.chinese: 本課程包含了習題，置放在作業區中。

sentences.english: And for Problem Set One, we'll defer to some online documentation for the specifics.
sentences.chinese: 對應習題集，我們將尊重一些網上的文檔中的細節。

sentences.english: Answers are provided to about half the problems, and are rounded off to two or three significant figures.
sentences.chinese: 大約一半的習題有答案，取二或三位有效數字。

sentences.english: Make sure you finish the exercises from previous weeks before the final exam.
sentences.chinese: 在期末考之前，務必要完成前幾周的練習題。

definition: courseware (abbr. for 課程軟件|课程软件[ke4 cheng2 ruan3 jian4])
to neglect sleep and forget about food (idiom)/to skip one's sleep and meals/to be completely wrapped up in one's work
lit. one body two sides (idiom)/fig. a situation with two sides to it
(of a pupil) to write down (in a dictation exercise)/dictation/(music) to transcribe by ear
to think for oneself and act accordingly (idiom); to act on one's own initiative
mountain and river exhausted (idiom); at the end of the line/nowhere to go
can't be bought for one thousand in gold (idiom)
